plot: Ghadi is different from other kids; could he be an angel? His father Leba, along with his teammates, tricks the town into believing so.
title: Ghadi
plot_es: Ghadi is different from other kids; could he be an angel? His father Leba, along with his teammates, tricks the town into believing so.
plot_en: Ghadi is different from other kids; could he be an angel? His father Leba, along with his teammates, tricks the town into believing so.
